title: News24.com | International Covid-19 update | UN chief: 'Not the time to reduce the resources' of WHO, US records 2 228 deaths in past 24 hours, 99-year-old beats coronavirus in Brazil
description: The United States has recorded 2 228 deaths related to the coronavirus pandemic over the past 24 hours, according to a tally by Johns Hopkins University.
